SEARCH
Package gw.datatype.handler

Interface IDataTypePersistenceHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
IDecimalPersistenceHandler, IEncryptablePersistenceHandler, IPrimaryKeyPersistenceHandler, IVarcharPersistenceHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClobPersistenceHandler, CurrencyAmountPersistenceHandler, DataTypePersistenceHandlerBase, DateOnlyPersistenceHandler, DatePersistenceHandler, DecimalPersistenceHandler, ForeignKeyPersistenceHandler, KeyPersistenceHandlerBase, NormalizedExchangeRatePersistenceHandler, PrimaryKeyPersistenceHandler, SimplePersistenceHandler, SoftEntityReferencePersistenceHandler, StringPersistenceHandlerBase, TypeKeyPersistenceHandler, TypelistKeyPersistenceHandler, VarBinaryPersistenceHandler, VarcharPersistenceHandler
public interface IDataTypePersistenceHandler
Defines persistence behavior for a datatype. A value associated with a datatype has 3 different forms:
  1. JDBC - The form used by the database
  2. Bean - The form used by the bean's internal storage
  3. Application - The form used by the application
The methods on this interface define translations between these different forms.
Author:
pdalbora

  • Method Details

    • getJdbcType

      GWJdbcType getJdbcType()
      The JDBC type corresponding to values of this datatype.

    • beanToApplication

      Object beanToApplication(Bean ctx, IEntityPropertyInfo property, Object beanValue)
      Converts a value stored in the bean into an instance of the datatype's value type.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the bean that owns the property to which the value corresponds. Not null.
      property - the property to which the value corresponds. Not null.
      beanValue - the value stored in the bean. Not null.
      Returns:
      an instance of the datatype's value type, corresponding to the given bean value.

    • applicationToBean

      Object applicationToBean(Bean ctx, IEntityPropertyInfo property, Object applicationValue)
      Converts a value stored in the bean into an instance of the datatype's value type.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the bean that owns the property to which the value corresponds. Not null.
      property - the property to which the value corresponds. Not null.
      applicationValue - the application value. Not null.
      Returns:
      a value suitable for storing on the bean.

    • jdbcToBean

      Object jdbcToBean(IEntityPropertyInfo property, Object jdbcValue)
      Converts a value returned by the JDBC driver into a value suitable for storing on the bean.
      Parameters:
      property - the associated property. May be null.
      jdbcValue - the value returned by the JDBC driver. Not null. See GWJdbcType for a reference of Java types for each JDBC type.

    • beanToJdbc

      Object beanToJdbc(IEntityPropertyInfo property, Object beanValue)
      Converts a bean value into the appropriate JDBC value type.
      Parameters:
      property - the associated property. May be null.
      beanValue - a value stored on the bean. Not null.
      Returns:
      the corresponding JDBC value. Must be an instance of the type associated with the getJdbcType().
      See Also:
      • jdbcToBean(gw.entity.IEntityPropertyInfo, Object)

    • getSize

      int getSize(Object beanValue)
      Parameters:
      beanValue -
      Returns:
      the size of the given object of this data type
